## Filters.FiltersCssClasses interface

The CSS class interface used for [Filters](./answers-react-components.filters.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface FiltersCssClasses extends CollapsibleLabelCssClasses 
```
<b>Extends:</b> CollapsibleLabelCssClasses

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [container?](./answers-react-components.filters.filterscssclasses.container.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Applies to outermost container of the groups of filters. |
|  [divider?](./answers-react-components.filters.filterscssclasses.divider.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Applies to the divider between groups of filters. |
|  [optionsContainer?](./answers-react-components.filters.filterscssclasses.optionscontainer.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Applies to container of individual group of filters. |
|  [searchableInputElement?](./answers-react-components.filters.filterscssclasses.searchableinputelement.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Applies to the filter option search input. |
